author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-442: Set the Axiom version to 1.2.8.
* Make sure that there is a single place where the Axiom (and Axis2) versions are defined.

* Eliminated the transport.version and axis2-transport-base.version properties. This makes sure that dependencies between different transport modules are consistent and that we can use maven-release-plugin.

author: rdonkin
msg: Switch to using module versions specified in the parent pom. RAT-38 https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/RAT-38

author: jleroux
msg: This is a generalized solution for an issue reported on dev ML <<encode-output="false" for display type="currency">>
By default encode-output is true for display fields. If the type is currency an amount like 1260 will be rendered as US$1,260.00 in USA but should be rendered 1 260,00 $ in France.
So with encoding an   is introduced in place of the space. And finally it's not rendered as 1 260,00 $ but as 1,00 $ which is ... false!

author: rdonkin
msg: Creating base directory didn't work so deleting before it causes issues. RAT-38 https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/RAT-38
